titleStmt.title: The differences of the time, in three dialogues the first, anent episcopacy, the second, anent the obligation of the covenants against episcopacy, the third, anent separation : intended for the quieting the minds of people, and settling them in more peace and unity.
titleStmt.author: Forrester, David, fl. 1679.

titleStmt.author: Forrester, David, fl. 1679.
